## Methods

### `loadData(data: ApiResponse) => Promise<void>`

Public method to load data from an external source (our PHP page).
This replaces the internal fetchData logic.

#### Parameters

| Name   | Type          | Description                        |
| ------ | ------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `data` | `ApiResponse` | The complete dataset for the grid. |

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
